name: Paul Resch
description: Paul Resch is a former corporate finance professional turned FinTech founder, and is the founder and CEO of Valutico. With a professional career focused on mergers and acquisitions, and valuations, he had a focus on identifying trends and issues across the valuation landscape. After work at Deutsche Bank, he developed Valutico as a solution to the widespread problem of a frustratingly slow and error-prone valuation process. By working with finance experts and data scientists, Valutico was born to change the quality and speed at which practitioners could perform accurate valuations.
